column4: any opinions on a nice graphical system monitor in ubuntu? for the desktop
conky will show it on the desktop
I like conky but I was hoping there might be a nicer looking one, to compliment compiz
gkrellm's not so nice looking. do you like widgets?
I don't honestly know what widgets are yet
what version of ubuntu are you using?
itll show up in system -> preferences -> screenlets
and you can launch them and tell them to autolaunch on start
it requires that you have compiz going though
oh wait you said you had it
yeah, should I use that link or just install via synaptic?
that one's more up to date / fixed
